name: ets2-ats-profiles
title: ETS2/ATS Profiles
description: Manage Euro Truck Simulator 2 and American Truck Simulator Profiles directly from Raycast!

commands.name: manage-ets2-profiles
commands.title: Manage ETS2 Profiles
commands.description: Manage your Euro Truck Simulator 2 Profiles easily!
commands.subtitle: ETS2/ATS Profiles

commands.name: manage-ats-profiles
commands.title: Manage ATS Profiles
commands.description: Manage your American Truck Simulator Profiles easily
commands.subtitle: ETS2/ATS Profiles

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

author: yugveer28
